page.title: 10 EMPLOYMENT IN KINGSWEAR
page.content: We wanted to find out where people who live in Kingswear worked.We collected information by sending a questionaire home to the parents of the children in Kingswear school.We asked how man members of eaeh family worked and we asked them to indicate whether they woked in Kingswear, Paignton,Totnes,Newton Abbot,Brixham,Dartmouth or some other place.The results were very interesting: 20 families responded. In 9 families one person worked In 10 " two people " In 1 " three " " 12 people worked in Kingswear.The furthest anyone travelled daily was to Plymouth { Dan Bradbury,Robert Ryder.
